summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 25, 2019. It documents routine operations, staff shortages, inmate movements, and notably records inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) as being on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion, following a reported possible suicide attempt that drew inquiries from USMS and the Daily News.

keyFacts: On July 25, 2019, inmate Jeffrey Epstein (BOP #76318-054) was on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion at the MCC New York.
The report notes that individuals from the US Marshals Service (USMS) and the Daily News were inquiring with institution staff about Epstein regarding a 'possible suicide attempt'.
The document highlights significant staff shortages, leading to unassigned correctional posts and staff exhaustion from working daily overtime.
Multiple inmates were placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) for possession of a cellular telephone on this date.
The report is a routine administrative log, but its recording of Epstein's status and external inquiries is a critical data point weeks before his death.
